Title: Provides for payments for home and community based long term care services
Summary: Provides for payments for home and community based long term care services; provides that funds appropriated to compensate for minimum wage requirements, shall not be subject to managed care risk adjustment on insurers.
LawCode: Add ยง3614-g, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to payments for home and community based long term care services
